featured.text: Scientific doctors try to observe sicknesses, look for logical patterns, and then find out how the human body works.
She thinks in a very logical way.

definition.zh_def: 合乎邏輯的，符合推理或思考的原則。
definition.en_def: Relating to or according to the rules of logic; reasonable or sensible.
definition.example: Her argument was logical and easy to follow.
